Error.Description: Represents an error that doesn't fall into any other category.
A problem occurred while working with the database. The error message will contain more information about the error.

Error.ErrorMessage: The operation results in a duplicate key for a unique index.
Error.Description: You are trying to create an item with a field that requires a unique value (for example: "Id"). The error shows that an item with such value already exists.

Error.ErrorMessage: Duplicate values already exist for field Number of content type "New".
Error.Description: You are trying to enforce a uniqueness constraint on the values of a field but the field already contains non-unique values.

Error.ErrorMessage: A user with the same username already exists.
Error.Description: The name of the user account you are creating or updating already exists.
You are trying to register a user without specifying a password.
You are trying to register a user without specifying a username.

Error.ErrorMessage: The password you specified is not a valid password literal.
Error.Description: The specified password is not in the correct format.
A user with the specified username and password combination does not exist in the system.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified user was not found.
Error.Scope: Change password, Set password, Reset password
Error.Description: The specified user was not found.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified user data is invalid.
Error.Description: Some of the data you specified when creating or updating a user is invalid. The error message will contain specific information about the invalid data.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified reset code is invalid.
Error.Description: The reset code that you passed is incorrect or has expired.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified verification code is invalid.
Error.Description: The verification code that you passed is incorrect or has expired.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified user is already verified.
Error.Description: You are attempting to verify a user account that has already been verified.

Error.ErrorMessage: A user with the specified email already exists.
Error.Description: You are attempting to use an email address that already exist in the system.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified user has no email address defined.
Error.Scope: Change password, Set password, Reset password, Register user, Resend verification
Error.Description: The requested operation requires an email address to be set for the user.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified identity provider is not supported.
Error.Scope: Register user, Link user, AD FS metadata
Error.Description: You have specified an identity provider value that is not recognized by the system.
The provider-generated user access token is not present in the request.
You have not specified an identity provider.

Error.ErrorMessage: Cannot retrieve a user for the specified token.
Error.Description: The system is unable to match the token you specified with a valid user for the identity provider you are using.

Error.ErrorMessage: The user is already linked with the specified provider.
Error.Description: The user has already been linked to the specified authentication provider.

Error.ErrorMessage: The user cannot be unlinked because she is not linked with the specified provider.
Error.Description: You are attempting to remove an authentication provider link that does not exist.
The user cannot be unlinked because it has a single identity provider.

Error.ErrorMessage: The operation is not supported for the given user.
Error.Description: Reset password and resend verification email are not available for users coming from external identity providers.

Error.ErrorMessage: The account quota is limited for this operation.
Error.Description: Your subscription plan does not allow you to run the operation. The message will vary based on the operation you are trying to perform.
The account that hosts the application has been disabled.

Error.ErrorMessage: The feature is not enabled for this account.
Error.Description: The experimental feature you are trying to use is not enabled for your account.
The provided access token is not valid.
The validity of the provided access token has expired.
The requested resource was not found.
The request is invalid. Consult the accompanying error message to find out what went wrong.
You cannot use this HTTP method with this resource.
You are not allowed to perform the operation.
You did not provide authorization which is required for this operation.
The API version is missing from the request URL.
The App ID is missing from the request URL.
The specified App ID is invalid. Make sure you are using the correct App ID.
The filter expression you specified is invalid. Make sure the filter expression is a valid JSON object and it is in the required format.
The sort expression you specified is invalid. Make sure the sort expression is a valid JSON object and it is in the required format.

Error.ErrorMessage: Missing or invalid content type. Please specify a valid Content-Type header.
Error.Description: The Content-Type header is required for this operation, but is either missing or invalid.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified content type was not found.
Error.Scope: All data operations*, Metadata operations† for content types
Error.Description: You specified an unexisting content type.
The Power Fields definition you specified is invalid. Make sure the Power Fields definition is a valid JSON object and it is in the required format.
The specified content type is not supported by this request.
The custom parameters expression you specified is invalid. Make sure it is a valid JSON object.
The body of the HTTP request is invalid. Make sure its format is consistent with the Content-Type header you specified.
The fields expression you specified is invalid. Make sure the fields expression is a valid JSON and it is in the required format.
An infinite loop was detected. This usually happens when your cloud code makes a call that results in the execution of the same code.
The expand expression you specified is invalid. Make sure the expand expression is in the required format.
The single field expression you specified is invalid. Make sure the single field expression is a non-empty string.
The metadata request contains or results in an invalid metadata definition. Refer to the accompanying error message to find out what went wrong.

Error.ErrorMessage: The specified response content type is not supported.
Error.Description: The response content type you specified in the request is not supported.
The request timed out. A request times out if it does not complete in specified interval.
The Data Link Server returned an error. Refer to the accompanying error message to find out what went wrong.
The application is down for maintenance. You are advised to stop all requests to it and resume them at a later time.
The required ContentType parameter is not specified.

Error.Scope: Upload file, Update file content, Set cloud code
Error.Description: You have not specified file content or the specified file content is invalid.

Error.Scope: Read by ID, Delete by ID, Update by ID
Error.Description: The specified item was not found.

Error.ErrorMessage: An error occurred during execution of custom server code.
Error.Scope: All data operations*, Execute cloud function
Error.Description: There was an error while executing your cloud code. Review your cloud code logic.

Error.ErrorMessage: The execution of the custom server code timed out.
Error.Scope: All data operations*, Execute cloud function
Error.Description: The execution of your custom code took too long. Make sure you properly call the "done" callback in all cases.

Error.ErrorMessage: The request was canceled by custom server code.
Error.Description: Your custom cloud code canceled the operation.

Error.ErrorMessage: The custom code definition failed to compile.
Error.Description: The cloud code for the operation failed to compile. Check your cloud code for typos and syntax errors.

Error.ErrorMessage: Custom cloud code is disabled for this type.
Error.Description: The cloud code for this content type have been disabled due to too many timeouts. Contact Support for more information.

Error.ErrorMessage: The request was processed but an error was generated by custom code.
Error.Description: If you don't include your own error code when you are setting an error in your cloud code, then this default code is automatically added.
There was an error processing the email template. The message may contain more information about the error.
A user with the specified username does not exist in the system.
Wrong password.
